mapper.select: select tag_content from t_tag t inner join t_note_tag n on t.Id=n.tag_id and n.note_id=#{noteId} and n.is_valid =1 and t.is_valid=1
select count(*) from t_note_tag nt where nt.note_id=#{noteId} and nt.tag_id=#{tagId} and nt.is_valid=1
mapper.update: update t_note_tag t set t.modify_time=(select now()),t.is_valid=0,t.modifier=#{creator} where t.creator=#{creator} and t.note_id=#{noteId} and t.tag_id=(select id from t_tag tt where tt.tag_content=#{tagContent} and tt.creator=#{creator})
